title: KHR_audio_graph Highpass Filter Node
description: A highpass filter allows frequencies above the cutoff frequency to pass through and attenuates frequencies below the cutoff. It implements a standard second-order resonant highpass filter with 12dB/octave rolloff.

id.description: A unique identifier of the highpass filter node in the scene.

qualityFactor.description: Controls how peaked the response will be at the cutoff frequency. A large value makes the response more peaked.

bypass.description: Disables this filter while still allowing unprocessed audio signals to pass.
